trans-unit.source: In the case of FULL_FLUSH or SYNC_FLUSH, if the return value is len, the space available in output buffer b, this method should be invoked again with the same flush parameter and more output space.
trans-unit.target: 在 FULL_FLUSH 或 SYNC_FLUSH 的情况下，如果返回值为 len （输出缓冲区 b 中的可用空间），则应使用相同的 flush 参数和更多的输出空间再次调用此方法。

trans-unit.source: In the case of ENTRY_CREATE, ENTRY_DELETE, and ENTRY_MODIFY events the context is a Path that is the relative path between the directory registered with the watch service, and the entry that is created, deleted, or modified.
trans-unit.target: 在 ENTRY_CREATE ， ENTRY_DELETE 和 ENTRY_MODIFY 事件的情况下，上下文是一个 Path ，它是在监视服务中注册的目录与创建，删除或修改的条目之间的 relative 路径。

trans-unit.source: In the case of invokeExact, the type descriptor of the invocation (after resolving symbolic type names) must exactly match the method type of the receiving method handle. In the case of plain, inexact invoke, the resolved type descriptor must be a valid argument to the receiver's asType method. Thus, plain invoke is more permissive than invokeExact.
trans-unit.target: 对于 invokeExact ，调用的类型描述符（在解析符号类型名称之后）必须与接收方法句柄的方法类型完全匹配。对于普通的，不精确的 invoke ，解析的类型描述符必须是接收者的 asType 方法的有效参数。因此，普通 invoke 比 invokeExact 更宽容。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a certificate factory for X.509 CRLs, inStream may contain a sequence of DER-encoded CRLs. In addition, inStream may contain a PKCS#7 CRL set. This is a PKCS#7

trans-unit.source: In the case of a certificate factory for X.509 certificates, the certificate provided in inStream must be DER-encoded and may be supplied in binary or printable (Base64) encoding. If the certificate is provided in Base64 encoding, it must be bounded at the beginning by -----BEGIN CERTIFICATE-----, and must be bounded at the end by -----END CERTIFICATE-----.

trans-unit.source: In the case of a channel to an IPv4 socket, the underlying operating system supports RFC 2236: Internet Group Management Protocol, Version 2 (IGMPv2). It may optionally support source filtering as specified by RFC 3376: Internet Group Management Protocol, Version 3 (IGMPv3). For channels to an IPv6 socket, the equivalent standards are RFC 2710: Multicast Listener Discovery (MLD) for IPv6 and RFC 3810: Multicast Listener Discovery Version 2 (MLDv2) for IPv6.
trans-unit.target: 对于到 IPv4 套接字的通道，底层操作系统支持RFC 2236：Internet组管理协议，版本2（IGMPv2）。它可以选择支持RFC 3376：Internet组管理协议版本3（IGMPv3）中指定的源过滤。对于通往 IPv6 套接字的通道，等效标准为RFC 2710：用于IPv6的多播侦听器发现（MLD）和RFC 3810：用于IPv6的多播侦听器发现版本2（MLDv2）。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a gap, when clocks jump forward, there is no valid offset. Instead, the local date-time is adjusted to be later by the length of the gap. For a typical one hour daylight savings change, the local date-time will be moved one hour later into the offset typically corresponding to "summer".
trans-unit.target: 在间隙的情况下,当时钟向前跳时,没有有效的偏移。取而代之的是,当地的日期时间会被调整为较晚的差距长度。对于典型的一个小时的夏令时变化,当地的日期时间将被移到通常对应于 "夏季 "的偏移量中晚一小时。

trans-unit.source: In the case of a gap, where clocks jump forward, there is no valid offset. Instead, the local date-time is adjusted to be later by the length of the gap. For a typical one hour daylight savings change, the local date-time will be moved one hour later into the offset typically corresponding to "summer".
trans-unit.target: 在间隙的情况下,时钟向前跳跃,没有有效的偏移。取而代之的是,当地的日期时间会被调整为较晚的差距长度。对于典型的一小时夏令时变化,当地的日期时间将被移到通常对应于 "夏季 "的偏移量中,晚一小时。

trans-unit.source: In the case of jar: and file: URLs, it also closes any files that were opened by it. If another thread is loading a class when the close method is invoked, then the result of that load is undefined.
trans-unit.target: 对于jar：和file：URL，它还会关闭由它打开的所有文件。如果在调用 close 方法时另一个线程正在加载一个类，则该加载的结果是不确定的。

trans-unit.source: In the case of stream-oriented sockets and the TCP/IP protocol, the size of the socket receive buffer may be used when advertising the size of the TCP receive window to the remote peer.
trans-unit.target: 在面向流的套接字和TCP/IP协议的情况下,当向远程对等体宣传TCP接收窗口的大小时,可以使用套接字接收缓冲区的大小。

trans-unit.source: In the case of stream-oriented sockets, this socket option will usually determine whether the socket can be bound to a socket address when a previous connection involving that socket address is in the TIME_WAIT state. On implementations where the semantics differ, and the socket option is not required to be enabled in order to bind the socket when a previous connection is in this state, then the implementation may choose to ignore this option.
trans-unit.target: 对于面向流的套接字，当涉及该套接字地址的先前连接处于TIME_WAIT状态时，此套接字选项通常将确定是否可以将套接字绑定到套接字地址。在语义不同的实现上，并且当先前的连接处于此状态时，不需要启用socket选项以绑定套接字，则实现可以选择忽略此选项。

trans-unit.source: In the case of the default provider, and a security manager is set, then the permission checks are performed using the path obtained by resolving the given relative path against the
trans-unit.target: 如果使用默认 provider ，并且设置了安全管理器，则将使用通过针对给定的相对路径解析获得的路径来执行权限检查。

trans-unit.source: In the case of the default provider, and a security manager is installed, the security manager is invoked to check RuntimePermission("getFileStoreAttributes"). If denied, then no file stores are returned by the iterator. In addition, the security manager's SecurityManager.checkRead(String) method is invoked to check read access to the file store's top-most directory. If denied, the file store is not returned by the iterator. It is system dependent if the permission checks are done when the iterator is obtained or during iteration.
trans-unit.target: 对于默认提供程序，并安装了安全管理器，将调用安全管理器以检查 RuntimePermission ("getFileStoreAttributes") 。如果被拒绝，则迭代器不返回任何文件存储。另外，安全管理器的 SecurityManager.checkRead(String) 方法被调用以检查对文件存储的最顶层目录的读取访问。如果被拒绝，则迭代器不返回文件存储。获取迭代器时或在迭代过程中是否进行了权限检查，这取决于系统。

trans-unit.source: In the case of the default provider, identified by the URI scheme "file", the given URI has a non-empty path component, and undefined query and fragment components. Whether the authority component may be present is platform specific. The returned Path is associated with the default file system.
trans-unit.target: 对于默认提供程序（由URI方案“文件”标识），给定URI具有非空路径组件以及未定义的查询和片段组件。权限组件是否存在取决于平台。返回的 Path 与 default 文件系统关联。

trans-unit.source: In the case of the default provider, path strings are parsed based on the definition of paths at the platform or virtual file system level. For example, an operating system may not allow specific characters to be present in a file name, but a specific underlying file store may impose different or additional restrictions on the set of legal characters.
trans-unit.target: 在默认提供者的情况下,路径字符串是根据平台或虚拟文件系统级别的路径定义来解析的。例如,操作系统可能不允许文件名中出现特定的字符,但特定的底层文件存储可能会对合法字符集施加不同的或额外的限制。

trans-unit.source: In the case of the default provider, the URI is hierarchical with a path component that is absolute. The query and fragment components are undefined. Whether the authority component is defined or not is implementation dependent. There is no guarantee that the URI may be used to construct a java.io.File. In particular, if this path represents a Universal Naming Convention (UNC) path, then the UNC server name may be encoded in the authority component of the resulting URI. In the case of the default provider, and the file exists, and it can be determined that the file is a directory, then the resulting URI will end with a slash.
trans-unit.target: 在默认提供程序的情况下，URI是带有绝对 path 组件的层次结构。查询和片段组件未定义。权限组件是否已定义取决于实现。无法保证可以使用 URI 来构造 java.io.File 。特别是，如果此路径表示通用命名约定（UNC）路径，则UNC服务器名称可以编码在所得URI的授权机构中。如果是默认提供程序，并且文件存在，并且可以确定该文件是目录，那么结果 URI 将以斜杠结尾。

trans-unit.source: In the case of the default provider, the returned seekable byte channel is a FileChannel.
trans-unit.target: 对于默认提供程序，返回的可搜索字节通道是 FileChannel 。

trans-unit.source: In the case of the default provider, this method returns the same separator as File.separator.
trans-unit.target: 对于默认提供程序，此方法返回与 File.separator 相同的分隔符。

trans-unit.source: In the case that the variant contains one or more underscores ('_'), a sequence of bundle names generated by truncating the last underscore and the part following it is inserted after a candidate bundle name with the original variant. For example, for a locale with language "en", script "Latn, country "US" and variant "WINDOWS_VISTA", and bundle base name "MyResource", the list of candidate bundle names below is generated:
trans-unit.target: 如果变体中包含一个或多个下划线('_'),则会将最后一个下划线及其后面的部分截断后生成的捆绑名称序列插入到带有原始变体的候选捆绑名称之后。例如,对于语言为 "en",脚本为 "Latn",国家为 "US",变体为 "WINDOWS_VISTA",捆绑包基名为 "MyResource "的locale,就会生成下面的候选捆绑包名称列表。

trans-unit.source: In the case where multiple LoginModules fail, this method propagates the exception raised by the first LoginModule which failed.
trans-unit.target: 在多个LoginModule失败的情况下，此方法传播第一个失败的 LoginModule 引发的异常。

trans-unit.source: In the common case, all of the pre-connection parameters and general request properties can be ignored: the pre-connection parameters and request properties default to sensible values. For most clients of this interface, there are only two interesting methods: getInputStream and getContent, which are mirrored in the URL class by convenience methods.
trans-unit.target: 在通常情况下，所有预连接参数和常规请求属性都可以忽略：预连接参数和请求属性默认为明智的值。对于此接口的大多数客户端，只有两种有趣的方法： getInputStream 和 getContent ，它们是通过便捷方法在 URL 类中进行镜像的。

trans-unit.source: In the context of annotation processing, the guarantees for "the same" implementation must include contexts where the API mediated side effects of processors could be visible to each other, including successive annotation processing rounds.
trans-unit.target: 在注释处理的上下文中，对“相同”实现的保证必须包括上下文，在该上下文中，API介导的处理器副作用可能彼此可见，包括连续的注释处理回合。

trans-unit.target: 在默认的 ThreadPoolExecutor.AbortPolicy 中，处理程序在拒绝时会抛出运行时 RejectedExecutionException 。

trans-unit.source: In the default ISO calendar system, June 2012 would have the value (2012 * 12 + 6 - 1). This field is primarily for internal use.
trans-unit.target: 在默认的ISO日历系统中，2012年6月将具有值 (2012 * 12 + 6 - 1) 。该字段主要供内部使用。

trans-unit.source: In the default ISO calendar system, there are two eras defined, 'BCE' and 'CE'. The era 'CE' is the one currently in use and year-of-era runs from 1 to the maximum value. The era 'BCE' is the previous era, and the year-of-era runs backwards.
trans-unit.target: 在默认的ISO日历系统中,定义了两个时代,"BCE "和 "CE"。年代'CE'是当前使用的年代,年代的年份从1到最大值。年代'BCE'是以前的年代,年代年份向后运行。

trans-unit.source: In the default ISO calendar system, there are two eras defined, 'BCE' and 'CE'. The era 'CE' is the one currently in use and year-of-era runs from 1 to the maximum value. The era 'BCE' is the previous era, and the year-of-era runs backwards. See YEAR_OF_ERA for a full example.
trans-unit.target: 在默认的ISO日历系统中，定义了两个时代，即“ BCE”和“ CE”。“ CE”时代是当前正在使用的时代，年龄从1到最大值。“公元前”时代是前一个时代，这一年倒退了。有关完整示例，请参见 YEAR_OF_ERA 。

trans-unit.source: In the event that multiple package defaults apply to a given class, the package default pertaining to the most specific package takes precedence over the others. For example, if javax.lang and javax.lang.reflect both have package defaults associated with them, the latter package default applies to classes in javax.lang.reflect.
trans-unit.target: 如果多个包默认值适用于给定的类，则与最具体的包有关的包默认值优先于其他包。例如，如果 javax.lang 和 javax.lang.reflect 都具有与之关联的程序包默认值，则后者的程序包默认值适用于 javax.lang.reflect 中的类。

trans-unit.source: In the final case, it is exactly as if the target method handle were temporarily adapted with a fixed arity collector to the arity required by the caller type. (As with asCollector, if the array length is zero, a shared constant may be used instead of a new array. If the implied call to asCollector would throw an IllegalArgumentException or WrongMethodTypeException, the call to the variable arity adapter must throw WrongMethodTypeException.)
trans-unit.target: 在最后一种情况下，就好像目标方法句柄是使用固定的Arity收集器临时适应了调用者类型所需的Arity一样。 （与 asCollector 一样，如果数组长度为零，则可以使用共享常量而不是新数组。如果对 asCollector 的隐式调用将引发 IllegalArgumentException 或 WrongMethodTypeException ，则对变量arity适配器的调用必须引发 WrongMethodTypeException 。）

trans-unit.source: In the first case the global color table in the stream metadata is used, in the second the local color table in the image metadata is used, and in the third a global color table is created from the ColorModel or SampleModel of the (first) image.
trans-unit.target: 在第一种情况下,使用流元数据中的全局颜色表,在第二种情况下,使用图像元数据中的局部颜色表,在第三种情况下,从(第一)图像的ColorModel或SampleModel创建一个全局颜色表。

trans-unit.source: In the first form, the methods defined by the Future interface may be used to check if the operation has completed, wait for its completion, and to retrieve the result. In the second form, a CompletionHandler is invoked to consume the result of the I/O operation when it completes or fails.
trans-unit.target: 在第一种形式中， Future 接口定义的方法可用于检查操作是否已完成，等待操作完成并检索结果。在第二种形式中，当 CompletionHandler 完成或失败时，将调用它来消耗I / O操作的结果。

trans-unit.source: In the foregoing description, the notation sgn(
trans-unit.target: 在前面的描述中，符号 sgn(

trans-unit.source: In the map, a key represents a language range whereas a value is a list of equivalents of it. '*' cannot be used in the map. Each equivalent language range has the same weight value as its original language range.
trans-unit.target: 在地图中，键代表语言范围，而值则是其等效列表。不能在地图中使用 '*' 。每个等效的语言范围都具有与其原始语言范围相同的权重值。

trans-unit.source: In the most typical usages, a fork-join pair act like a call (fork) and return (join) from a parallel recursive function. As is the case with other forms of recursive calls, returns (joins) should be performed innermost-first. For example, a.fork(); b.fork(); b.join(); a.join(); is likely to be substantially more efficient than joining a before b.
trans-unit.target: 在最典型的用法中，fork-join对的作用类似于调用（fork），并从并行递归函数中返回（join）。与其他形式的递归调用一样，返回（联接）应从最里面开始执行。例如， a.fork(); b.fork(); b.join(); a.join(); 比加入 a 之前 b 可能更有效率。

trans-unit.source: In the resolving phase of parsing, a date can be created from a Julian Day field. In strict mode and smart mode the Julian Day value is validated against the range of valid values. In lenient mode no validation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在解析的解析阶段，可以从儒略日字段创建日期。在严格模式和智能模式下，会根据有效值范围验证儒略日值。在宽大模式下，不会进行验证。

trans-unit.source: In the resolving phase of parsing, a date can be created from a Modified Julian Day field. In strict mode and smart mode the Modified Julian Day value is validated against the range of valid values. In lenient mode no validation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在解析的解析阶段，可以从“修改的儒略日”字段创建日期。在严格模式和智能模式下，已修改的儒略日值将针对有效值范围进行验证。在宽大模式下，不会进行验证。

trans-unit.source: In the resolving phase of parsing, a date can be created from a Rata Die field. In strict mode and smart mode the Rata Die value is validated against the range of valid values. In lenient mode no validation occurs.
trans-unit.target: 在解析的解析阶段，可以从“ Rata Die”字段中创建日期。在严格模式和智能模式下，将根据有效值范围对Rata Die值进行验证。在宽大模式下，不会进行验证。

trans-unit.source: In the resolving phase of parsing, a date can be created from a week-based-year, week-of-week-based-year and day-of-week.
trans-unit.target: 在解析阶段,可以从以周为单位的年、以周为单位的年和以周为单位的天创建日期。

trans-unit.source: In the resolving phase of parsing, a date can be created from a week-based-year, week-of-week-based-year and day-of-week. See WEEK_OF_WEEK_BASED_YEAR for details.
trans-unit.target: 在解析的解析阶段，可以从基于周的年，基于周的周的年和周的日创建日期。有关详细信息，请参见 WEEK_OF_WEEK_BASED_YEAR 。

trans-unit.source: In the resolving phase of parsing, a date can be created from a week-based-year, week-of-year and day-of-week.
trans-unit.target: 在解析阶段,可以从以周为单位的年份、以周为单位的年份和以周为单位的日期中创建一个日期。

trans-unit.source: In the resolving phase of parsing, a date can be created from a year, quarter-of-year and day-of-quarter.
trans-unit.target: 在解析阶段,可以从年、年的季度和季度的天创建一个日期。

trans-unit.source: In the resolving phase of parsing, a date can be created from a year, quarter-of-year and day-of-quarter. See DAY_OF_QUARTER for details.
trans-unit.target: 在解析的解析阶段，可以从一年，每季度和每天的一天创建日期。有关详情，请参见 DAY_OF_QUARTER 。

trans-unit.source: In the resolving phase of parsing, a date can be created from a year, week-of-month, month-of-year and day-of-week.
trans-unit.target: 在解析阶段,可以从年、月、年月和周天中创建日期。

trans-unit.source: In the resolving phase of parsing, a date can be created from a year, week-of-year and day-of-week.
trans-unit.target: 在解析阶段,可以从年份、年月日和星期日中创建一个日期。

trans-unit.source: In the resolving phase of parsing, a localized day-of-week will be converted to a standardized ChronoField day-of-week. The day-of-week must be in the valid range 1 to 7. Other fields in this class build dates using the standardized day-of-week.
trans-unit.target: 在解析的解析阶段，本地化的星期几将转换为标准化的 ChronoField 星期几。星期几必须在1到7的有效范围内。此类中的其他字段使用标准化的星期几来构建日期。

trans-unit.source: In the retransform and redefine cases, the transformer must support the redefinition semantics: if a class that the transformer changed during initial definition is later retransformed or redefined, the transformer must insure that the second class output class file is a legal redefinition of the first output class file.
trans-unit.target: 在重构和重定义的情况下,变换器必须支持重定义语义:如果变换器在初始定义时改变的类后来被重构或重定义,变换器必须保证第二个类输出的类文件是第一个输出类文件的合法重定义。

trans-unit.source: In the second phase, if the LoginContext's overall authentication succeeded (the relevant REQUIRED, REQUISITE, SUFFICIENT and OPTIONAL LoginModules succeeded), then the commit method for the LoginModule gets invoked. The commit method for a LoginModule checks its privately saved state to see if its own authentication succeeded. If the overall LoginContext authentication succeeded and the LoginModule's own authentication succeeded, then the commit method associates the relevant Principals (authenticated identities) and Credentials (authentication data such as cryptographic keys) with the Subject located within the LoginModule.
trans-unit.target: 在第二阶段中，如果LoginContext的整体身份验证成功（相关的REQUIRED，REQUISITE，SUFFICIENT和OPTIONAL LoginModules成功），则将调用 LoginModule 的 commit 方法。 LoginModule 的 commit 方法检查其私有保存的状态，以查看其自身的身份验证是否成功。如果整个 LoginContext 的认证成功，并且LoginModule的自己的身份验证成功，则 commit 方法会将相关的校长（验证的身份）和凭据（如加密密钥的认证数据）的 Subject 所在内 LoginModule 。

trans-unit.source: In theory, it is possible for there to be more than two valid offsets. This would happen if clocks to be put back more than once in quick succession. This has never happened in the history of time-zones and thus has no special handling. However, if it were to happen, then the list would return more than 2 entries.
trans-unit.target: 理论上,有可能存在两个以上的有效偏移。如果时钟被快速连续地放回一次以上,就会出现这种情况。这在时区的历史上从未发生过,因此没有特殊的处理。但是,如果发生这种情况,那么列表将返回超过2个条目。

trans-unit.source: In this example, widgets is a Collection<Widget>. We create a stream of Widget objects via Collection.stream(), filter it to produce a stream containing only the red widgets, and then transform it into a stream of int values representing the weight of each red widget. trans-unit.source: In this example, as well as others in which tasks have no other effects except to compareAndSet a common result, the trailing unconditional invocation of tryComplete could be made conditional (if (result.get() == null) tryComplete();) because no further bookkeeping is required to manage completions once the root task completes.
trans-unit.target: 在此示例中，以及其他任务没有其他效果（除了compareAndSet共同的结果），可以将 tryComplete 的尾随无条件调用设为有条件的（ if (result.get() == null) tryComplete(); ），因为根任务完成后，无需再进行簿记来管理完成情况。

trans-unit.source: In this managed object, there is an attribute called Usage of type MemoryUsage. The point of an attribute like this is that it gives a coherent snapshot of a set of data items. For example, it might include the current amount of used memory in the memory pool, and the current maximum of the memory pool. If these were separate items, obtained with separate getAttribute calls, then we could get values seen at different times that were not consistent. We might get a used value that was greater than the max value.
trans-unit.target: 在此托管对象中，有一个名为 Usage 的属性，类型为 MemoryUsage 。这样的属性的要点是，它给出了一组数据项的连贯快照。例如，它可能包括内存池中的当前已用内存量以及内存池的当前最大值。如果这些是单独的项目，是通过单独的 getAttribute 调用获得的，那么我们可以获得在不同时间看到的不一致的值。我们可能会得到一个 used 值比更大的 max 价值。

trans-unit.source: Increasing the buffer size may allow multiple outgoing packets to be queued by the network implementation when the send rate is high.
trans-unit.target: 增加缓冲区大小,当发送速率较高时,网络实现可能会允许多个外发数据包排队。

trans-unit.source: Increasing the receive buffer size can increase the performance of network I/O for high-volume connection, while decreasing it can help reduce the backlog of incoming data.
trans-unit.target: 增加接收缓冲区的大小可以提高大批量连接的网络I/O性能,而减少缓冲区的大小则有助于减少输入数据的积压。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an annotation type is automatically inherited.
trans-unit.target: 表示注解类型是自动继承的。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an annotation type is automatically inherited. If an Inherited meta-annotation is present on an annotation type declaration, and the user queries the annotation type on a class declaration, and the class declaration has no annotation for this type, then the class's superclass will automatically be queried for the annotation type. This process will be repeated until an annotation for this type is found, or the top of the class hierarchy (Object) is reached. If no superclass has an annotation for this type, then the query will indicate that the class in question has no such annotation.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个注解类型是自动继承的。如果在注解类型声明上存在继承元注解,并且用户在类声明上查询注解类型,而类声明中没有该类型的注解,那么类的超类将自动查询该注解类型。这个过程将重复进行,直到找到该类型的注解,或者到达类层次结构的顶端(Object)。如果没有超级类有这种类型的注解,那么查询将表明该类没有这种注解。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an attribute called "transient" should be declared with the given value when the Introspector constructs a PropertyDescriptor or EventSetDescriptor classes associated with the annotated code element.
trans-unit.target: 指示当 Introspector 构造与带注释的代码元素关联的 PropertyDescriptor 或 EventSetDescriptor 类时，应使用给定 value 声明一个名为“ transient”的属性。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an attribute called "transient" should be declared with the given value when the Introspector constructs a PropertyDescriptor or EventSetDescriptor classes associated with the annotated code element. A true value for the "transient" attribute indicates to encoders derived from Encoder that this feature should be ignored.
trans-unit.target: 指示当 Introspector 构造与带注释的代码元素关联的 PropertyDescriptor 或 EventSetDescriptor 类时，应使用给定 value 声明一个名为“ transient”的属性。一个 true 的“瞬时”属性值表示源自编码器， Encoder ，这个功能应该被忽略。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an error has occurred.
trans-unit.target: 表示发生了错误。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an unknown kind of annotation value was encountered.
trans-unit.target: 表示遇到了一种未知的注解值。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an unknown kind of annotation value was encountered. This can occur if the language evolves and new kinds of annotation values can be stored in an annotation. May be thrown by an annotation value visitor to indicate that the visitor was created for a prior version of the language.
trans-unit.target: 表示遇到未知类型的注释值。如果语言不断发展并且新的注释值可以存储在注释中，则会发生这种情况。注释值访问者可能会抛出该异常，以表明该访问者是为该语言的先前版本创建的。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an unknown kind of element was encountered.
trans-unit.target: 表示遇到了未知的元素。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an unknown kind of element was encountered. This can occur if the language evolves and new kinds of elements are added to the Element hierarchy. May be thrown by an element visitor to indicate that the visitor was created for a prior version of the language.
trans-unit.target: 表示遇到未知类型的元素。如果语言不断发展并将新的元素添加到 Element 层次结构中，则会发生这种情况。元素访问者可能会抛出该异常，以表明该访问者是为该语言的先前版本创建的。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an unknown kind of type was encountered.
trans-unit.target: 表示遇到了未知的类型。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that an unknown kind of type was encountered. This can occur if the language evolves and new kinds of types are added to the TypeMirror hierarchy. May be thrown by a type visitor to indicate that the visitor was created for a prior version of the language.
trans-unit.target: 表示遇到未知类型的类型。如果语言不断发展并将新类型的类型添加到 TypeMirror 层次结构中，则可能会发生这种情况。类型访问者可能会抛出该异常，以表明该访问者是为该语言的先前版本创建的。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that annotations with a type are to be documented by javadoc and similar tools by default.
trans-unit.target: 表示带有类型的注解默认由javadoc和类似的工具来记录。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that annotations with a type are to be documented by javadoc and similar tools by default. This type should be used to annotate the declarations of types whose annotations affect the use of annotated elements by their clients. If a type declaration is annotated with Documented, its annotations become part of the public API of the annotated elements.
trans-unit.target: 表示带有类型的注解默认由 javadoc 和类似的工具来记录。这个类型应该被用来注解类型的声明,这些类型的注解会影响客户端对注解元素的使用。如果一个类型声明被注解为Documented,它的注解就会成为被注解元素的公共API的一部分。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that jobs are processing; new jobs will wait before processing.
trans-unit.target: 表示作业正在处理,新的作业将在处理前等待。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that new jobs can start processing without waiting.
trans-unit.target: 表示新的作业可以不用等待就开始处理。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that no jobs can be processed and intervention is required.
trans-unit.target: 表示不能处理作业,需要干预。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that one or more deserialized objects failed validation tests.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个或多个反序列化对象未通过验证测试。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that one or more deserialized objects failed validation tests. The argument should provide the reason for the failure.
trans-unit.target: 表示一个或多个反序列化对象未能通过验证测试。该参数应提供失败的原因。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that other requests to the server are unlikely in the near future. Calling disconnect() should not imply that this HttpURLConnection instance can be reused for other requests.
trans-unit.target: 表示近期不太可能向服务器发出其他请求。调用disconnect()不应该意味着这个HttpURLConnection实例可以重用于其他请求。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that subprocess I/O source or destination will be the same as those of the current process. This is the normal behavior of most operating system command interpreters (shells).
trans-unit.target: 表示子进程的I/O源或目标将与当前进程的I/O源或目标相同。这是大多数操作系统命令解释器(shell)的正常行为。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that subprocess I/O will be connected to the current Java process over a pipe. This is the default handling of subprocess standard I/O.
trans-unit.target: 表示子进程I/O将通过管道连接到当前Java进程。这是子进程标准I/O的默认处理方式。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the PrinterStateReason is a "report" (least severe). An implementation may choose to omit some or all reports. Some reports specify finer granularity about the printer state; others serve as a precursor to a warning. A report must contain nothing that could affect the printed output.
trans-unit.target: 指示 PrinterStateReason 是“报告”（最不严重）。一个实现可以选择省略一些或所有报告。一些报告指定了有关打印机状态的更精细的粒度。其他作为警告的先兆。报告中不得包含任何可能影响打印输出的内容。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the PrinterStateReason is a "warning." An implementation may choose to omit some or all warnings. Warnings serve as a precursor to an error. A warning must contain nothing that prevents a job from completing, though in some cases the output may be of lower quality.
trans-unit.target: 表示 PrinterStateReason 是“警告”。一个实现可以选择省略一些或所有警告。警告是错误的先兆。警告中不能包含任何妨碍完成工作的内容，尽管在某些情况下输出的质量可能较低。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the PrinterStateReason is an "error" (most severe). An implementation must include all errors. If this attribute contains one or more errors, the printer's PrinterState must be STOPPED.
trans-unit.target: 指示 PrinterStateReason 是“错误”（最严重）。实现必须包含所有错误。如果此属性包含一个或多个错误，则必须停止打印机的 PrinterState 。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the application has finished using the receiver, and that limited resources it requires may be released or made available.
trans-unit.target: 表示应用程序已经完成了对接收器的使用,它所需要的有限资源可能被释放或提供。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the application has finished using the transmitter, and that limited resources it requires may be released or made available.
trans-unit.target: 表明应用程序已经完成了对发射机的使用,它所需要的有限资源可能被释放或提供。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the client and server could not negotiate the desired level of security.
trans-unit.target: 表示客户端和服务器无法协商出所需的安全级别。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the client and server could not negotiate the desired level of security. The connection is no longer usable.
trans-unit.target: 表示客户端和服务器无法协商所需的安全级别。该连接已无法使用。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the collection operation does not commit to preserving the encounter order of input elements. (This might be true if the result container has no intrinsic order, such as a Set.)
trans-unit.target: 指示收集操作不致力于保留输入元素的遇到顺序。（如果结果容器没有内部顺序，例如 Set ，则可能为true 。）

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the finisher function is the identity function and can be elided. If set, it must be the case that an unchecked cast from A to R will succeed.
trans-unit.target: 表示结束函数是身份函数,可以省略。如果设置,则必须是未被选中的从A到R的转码成功。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the impact of the operation is unknown or cannot be expressed using one of the other values.
trans-unit.target: 表示该行动的影响未知或不能用其他数值之一表示。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the named compiler warnings should be suppressed in the annotated element (and in all program elements contained in the annotated element).
trans-unit.target: 表示在注释元素中(以及在注释元素中包含的所有程序元素中)应抑制命名的编译器警告。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the named compiler warnings should be suppressed in the annotated element (and in all program elements contained in the annotated element). Note that the set of warnings suppressed in a given element is a superset of the warnings suppressed in all containing elements. For example, if you annotate a class to suppress one warning and annotate a method to suppress another, both warnings will be suppressed in the method.
trans-unit.target: 表示命名的编译器警告应该被抑制在注释元素中(以及注释元素中包含的所有程序元素中)。请注意,在给定元素中被抑制的警告集是所有包含元素中被抑制的警告的超集。例如,如果你注解一个类来抑制一个警告,而注解一个方法来抑制另一个警告,那么这两个警告都会在方法中被抑制。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the operation is both read-like and write-like: it has an effect, and it also returns information from the MBean.
trans-unit.target: 表示操作既像读,又像写:它有效果,也会返回MBean的信息。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the operation is read-like: it returns information but does not change any state.
trans-unit.target: 表示该操作类似于读:它返回信息但不改变任何状态。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the operation is write-like: it has an effect but does not return any information from the MBean.
trans-unit.target: 表示该操作是类似于写的:它有效果,但不从MBean中返回任何信息。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the peer's identity has not been verified.
trans-unit.target: 表示尚未验证对等体的身份。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the printer cannot access the URI address. For example, the printer might report this error if it goes to get the print data and cannot even establish a connection to the URI address.
trans-unit.target: 表示打印机无法访问URI地址。例如,如果打印机在获取打印数据时,甚至无法建立与URI地址的连接,就会报告此错误。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that the printer does not support the URI scheme ("http", "ftp", etc.) in the URI address.
trans-unit.target: 表示打印机在URI地址中不支持URI方案("http"、"ftp "等)。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this collector is concurrent, meaning that the result container can support the accumulator function being called concurrently with the same result container from multiple threads.
trans-unit.target: 指示此收集器是并发的，这意味着结果容器可以支持与来自多个线程的同一结果容器并发调用的累加器函数。

trans-unit.source: Indicates that this object has no longer changed, or that it has already notified all of its observers of its most recent change, so that the hasChanged method will now return false. This method is called automatically by the notifyObservers methods.
trans-unit.target: 指示此对象不再更改，或者它已经将其最近的更改通知了其所有观察者，因此 hasChanged 方法现在将返回 false 。这个方法由 notifyObservers 方法自动调用。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the containing annotation type for the repeatable annotation type.
trans-unit.target: 指示可重复注释类型的包含注释类型。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the action to take when a class-file containing an unknown attribute is encountered. Possible values are the strings ERROR, STRIP, and PASS.
trans-unit.target: 指示遇到包含未知属性的类文件时要采取的措施。可能的值为字符串 ERROR ， STRIP 和 PASS 。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the caching policy for successful name lookups from the name service. The value is specified as as integer to indicate the number of seconds to cache the successful lookup. The default setting is to cache for an implementation specific period of time.
trans-unit.target: 表示从名称服务成功查找名称的缓存策略。该值被指定为整数,表示缓存成功查找的秒数。默认设置是缓存特定的实现时间。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the caching policy for un-successful name lookups from the name service. The value is specified as as integer to indicate the number of seconds to cache the failure for un-successful lookups.
trans-unit.target: 表示对姓名服务中不成功的姓名查询的缓存策略。该值指定为整数,表示缓存不成功查找的秒数。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the contexts in which an annotation type is applicable.
trans-unit.target: 表示适用注解类型的上下文。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the contexts in which an annotation type is applicable. The declaration contexts and type contexts in which an annotation type may be applicable are specified in JLS 9.6.4.1, and denoted in source code by enum constants of java.lang.annotation.ElementType.
trans-unit.target: 指示注释类型适用的上下文。在JLS 9.6.4.1中指定了可以在其中应用注释类型的声明上下文和类型上下文，并在源代码中用 java.lang.annotation.ElementType 的枚举常量表示。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the end of a batch of search results.
trans-unit.target: 表示一批搜索结果的结束。

trans-unit.source: Indicates the end of a batch of search results. Contains an estimate of the total number of entries in the result set and an opaque cookie. The cookie must be supplied to the next search operation in order to get the next batch of results.
trans-unit.target: 表示一批搜索结果的结束。包含一个结果集的总条目数的估计值和一个不透明的cookie。该cookie必须提供给下一次搜索操作,以获得下一批结果。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether a MIDI file of the file type specified can be written from the sequence indicated.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否可以从指定的序列中写入指定文件类型的MIDI文件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether an audio file of the specified file type can be written from the indicated audio input stream.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否可以从指定的音频输入流中写入指定文件类型的音频文件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether an audio file of the type specified can be written from the audio input stream indicated.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否可以从指定的音频输入流中写入指定类型的音频文件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether an audio input stream of a specified format can be obtained from an audio input stream of another specified format.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否可以从另一种指定格式的音频输入流中获取指定格式的音频输入流。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether an audio input stream of the specified encoding can be obtained from an audio input stream that has the specified format.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否可以从具有指定格式的音频输入流中获得指定编码的音频输入流。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether file writing support for the specified MIDI file type is provided by the system.
trans-unit.target: 表示系统是否提供对指定MIDI文件类型的文件写入支持。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether file writing support for the specified MIDI file type is provided by this file writer.
trans-unit.target: 表示该文件写入器是否提供对指定MIDI文件类型的文件写入支持。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether file writing support for the specified file type is provided by the system.
trans-unit.target: 表示系统是否提供对指定文件类型的文件写入支持。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether file writing support for the specified file type is provided by this audio file writer.
trans-unit.target: 表示该音频文件写入器是否提供对指定文件类型的文件写入支持。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this Optional. The other object is considered equal if:
trans-unit.target: 表示其他对象是否 "等于 "该任择议定书。其他对象在以下情况下被认为是相等的:

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this OptionalDouble. The other object is considered equal if:
trans-unit.target: 表示其他对象是否 "等于 "这个 OptionalDouble。其他对象被认为等于,如果:

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this OptionalInt. The other object is considered equal if:
trans-unit.target: 表示其他对象是否 "等于 "这个 OptionalInt。其他对象被认为等于,如果:

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this OptionalLong. The other object is considered equal if:
trans-unit.target: 表示其他对象是否 "等于 "这个 OptionalLong。其他对象被认为等于,如果:

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this comparator. This method must obey the general contract of Object.equals(Object). Additionally, this method can return true
trans-unit.target: 指示其他某个对象是否“等于”该比较器。此方法必须遵守 Object.equals(Object) 的常规协定。此外，此方法可以返回 true

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this one.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否有其他对象 "等于 "这个对象。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether some other object is "equal to" this server name.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否有其他对象 "等于 "这个服务器名称。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether some other object is equal to this one. This method returns true if and only if obj is an instance of JMXServiceURL whose getProtocol(), getHost(), getPort(), and getURLPath() methods return the same values as for this object. The values for getProtocol() and getHost() can differ in case without affecting equality.
trans-unit.target: 指示其他某个对象是否与此对象相等。当且仅当 obj 是 JMXServiceURL 的实例，并且该对象的 getProtocol() ， getHost() ， getPort() 和 getURLPath() 方法返回与此对象相同的值时，此方法才返回true 。在不影响相等性的情况下， getProtocol() 和 getHost() 的值可以不同。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the Sequencer is currently recording. The default is false. The Sequencer begins recording when startRecording() is called, and then returns true until stop() or stopRecording() is called.
trans-unit.target: 指示音序器当前是否正在录制。默认值为 false 。当调用 startRecording() 时，音序器开始记录，然后返回 true ,直到调用 stop() 或 stopRecording() 。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the Sequencer is currently running. The default is false. The Sequencer starts running when either start() or startRecording() is called. isRunning then returns true until playback of the sequence completes or stop() is called.
trans-unit.target: 指示音序器当前是否正在运行。默认值为 false 。当调用 start() 或 startRecording() 时，定序器开始运行。然后 isRunning 返回 true ,直到序列的播放完成或调用 stop() 为止。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the audio data is stored in big-endian or little-endian byte order. If the sample size is not more than one byte, the return value is irrelevant.
trans-unit.target: 表示音频数据是以大字节还是小字节顺序存储。如果样本大小不超过一个字节,则返回值与此无关。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the audio data is stored in big-endian or little-endian order.
trans-unit.target: 表示音频数据是以大段或小段顺序存储。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cookie should be considered HTTP Only. If set to true it means the cookie should not be accessible to scripting engines like javascript.
trans-unit.target: 指示是否应将cookie视为仅HTTP。如果设置为 true ,则表示javascript等脚本引擎不应访问该cookie。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the cookie should only be sent using a secure protocol, such as HTTPS or SSL.
trans-unit.target: 表示是否只能使用安全协议(如HTTPS或SSL)发送cookie。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the device provider supports the device represented by the specified device info object.
trans-unit.target: 表示设备提供商是否支持指定设备信息对象所代表的设备。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the format converter supports conversion from the specified source format encoding.
trans-unit.target: 表示格式转换器是否支持从指定的源格式编码进行转换。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the format converter supports conversion to a particular encoding from a particular format.
trans-unit.target: 表示格式转换器是否支持从特定的格式转换为特定的编码。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the format converter supports conversion to one particular format from another.
trans-unit.target: 表示格式转换器是否支持从一种特定格式转换为另一种特定格式。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the format converter supports conversion to the specified target format encoding.
trans-unit.target: 表示格式转换器是否支持转换为指定的目标格式编码。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the line is engaging in active I/O (such as playback or capture). When an inactive line becomes active, it sends a START event to its listeners. Similarly, when an active line becomes inactive, it sends a STOP event.
trans-unit.target: 指示线路是否正在使用活动的I / O（例如回放或捕获）。当非活动线路变为活动状态时，它将 START 事件发送到其侦听器。同样，当活动线路变为非活动状态时，它将发送 STOP 事件。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the line is open, meaning that it has reserved system resources and is operational, although it might not currently be playing or capturing sound.
trans-unit.target: 表示线路是否开放,即线路已经预留了系统资源,虽然目前可能还没有播放或捕捉声音,但已经开始运行。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the line is running. The default is false. An open line begins running when the first data is presented in response to an invocation of the start method, and continues until presentation ceases in response to a call to stop or because playback completes.
trans-unit.target: 指示线路是否正在运行。默认值为 false 。一个开放的行开始运行时，所述第一数据，以响应所述的调用呈现 start 方法，并且继续进行，直到不再呈现在响应于一个呼叫 stop 或因为回放完成。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the line supports a control of the specified type. Some controls may only be available when the line is open.
trans-unit.target: 表示该行是否支持指定类型的控件。有些控件可能只有在该行打开时才可用。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the mixer provider supports the mixer represented by the specified mixer info object.
trans-unit.target: 表示混音器提供者是否支持指定的混音器信息对象所代表的混音器。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the mixer supports a line (or lines) that match the specified Line.Info object. Some lines may only be supported when this mixer is open.
trans-unit.target: 指示混合器是否支持与指定 Line.Info 对象匹配的一行。仅在打开此混音器时才支持某些线路。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the port is a source or a target for its mixer.
trans-unit.target: 表示该端口是混频器的源头还是目标。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the requested sort of search results was successful or not.
trans-unit.target: 表示请求的搜索结果排序是否成功。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the requested sort of search results was successful or not. When the result code indicates success then the results have been sorted as requested. Otherwise the sort was unsuccessful and additional details regarding the cause of the error may have been provided by the server.
trans-unit.target: 表示请求的搜索结果排序是否成功。当结果代码显示成功时,那么结果已经按照要求进行了排序。否则排序不成功,服务器可能提供了关于错误原因的额外细节。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified info object matches this one. To match, the specified object must be identical to or a special case of this one. The specified info object must be either an instance of the same class as this one, or an instance of a sub-type of this one. In addition, the attributes of the specified object must be compatible with the capabilities of this one. Specifically, the routing configuration for the specified info object must be compatible with that of this one. Subclasses may add other criteria to determine whether the two objects match.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定的信息对象是否与此对象匹配。要匹配,指定的对象必须与本对象相同,或者是本对象的特例。指定的信息对象必须是与此对象相同的类的实例,或者是此对象的子类型的实例。此外,指定对象的属性必须与这个对象的功能兼容。具体来说,指定信息对象的路由配置必须与这个对象的路由配置兼容。子类可以添加其他标准来确定两个对象是否匹配。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified object is equal to this event type, returning true if the objects are identical.
trans-unit.target: 指示指定的对象是否等于此事件类型，如果对象相同，则返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the specified object is equal to this reverb type, returning true if the objects are identical.
trans-unit.target: 指示指定的对象是否等于此混响类型，如果对象相同，则返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the system supports any lines that match the specified Line.Info object. A line is supported if any installed mixer supports it.
trans-unit.target: 指示系统是否支持与指定 Line.Info 对象匹配的任何行。如果已安装的任何混音器支持，则支持该线路。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether the voice is currently processing a MIDI note. See the explanation of active and inactive voices.
trans-unit.target: 指示语音当前是否正在处理MIDI音符。请参阅对活动声音和不活动声音的说明。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this data line supports a particular audio format. The default implementation of this method simply returns true if the specified format matches any of the supported formats.
trans-unit.target: 指示此数据线是否支持特定的音频格式。如果指定的格式与任何受支持的格式匹配，则此方法的默认实现仅返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this format matches the one specified. To match, two formats must have the same encoding, and consistent values of the number of channels, sample rate, sample size, frame rate, and frame size. The values of the property are consistent if they are equal or the specified format has the property value AudioSystem.NOT_SPECIFIED. The byte order (big-endian or little-endian) must be the same if the sample size is greater than one byte.
trans-unit.target: 指示此格式是否与指定的格式匹配。为了匹配，两种格式必须具有相同的编码，并且通道数，采样率，采样大小，帧速率和帧大小的值必须一致。如果属性值相等或指定的格式具有属性值 AudioSystem.NOT_SPECIFIED ,则该属性值是一致的。如果样本大小大于一个字节，则字节顺序（大端或小端）必须相同。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this info object specified matches this one. To match, the match requirements of the superclass must be met and the types must be equal.
trans-unit.target: 表示指定的这个信息对象是否与这个对象匹配。要匹配,必须满足超类的匹配要求,且类型必须相等。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether this resource can be shared between this component and other components. This may be specified for resources representing a connection factory of any supported type, and must not be specified for resources of other types.
trans-unit.target: 表示此资源是否可以在此组件和其他组件之间共享。这可以为代表任何支持类型的连接工厂的资源指定,不能为其他类型的资源指定。

trans-unit.source: Indicates whether two info objects are equal, returning true if they are identical.
trans-unit.target: 指示两个信息对象是否相等，如果相同则返回 true 。

trans-unit.source: Indirect access to the behavior specified by the provided MethodHandle proceeds in order through three phases:
trans-unit.target: 通过三个阶段 MethodHandle 进行对提供的MethodHandle指定的行为的间接访问：

trans-unit.source: Indirectly Present
trans-unit.target: 间接呈现

trans-unit.source: Individual features such as tiling, progressive encoding, and compression may be set in one of four modes. MODE_DISABLED disables the features; MODE_DEFAULT enables the feature with writer-controlled parameter values; MODE_EXPLICIT enables the feature and allows the use of a set method to provide additional parameters; and MODE_COPY_FROM_METADATA copies relevant parameter values from the stream and image metadata objects passed to the writer. The default for all features is MODE_COPY_FROM_METADATA. Non-standard features supplied in subclasses are encouraged, but not required to use a similar scheme.
trans-unit.target: 诸如切片，逐行编码和压缩之类的各个功能可以设置为四种模式之一。 MODE_DISABLED 禁用功能； MODE_DEFAULT 启用具有作者控制的参数值的功能； MODE_EXPLICIT 启用该功能并允许使用 set 方法来提供其他参数；和 MODE_COPY_FROM_METADATA 从传递给写程序的流和图像元数据对象中复制相关的参数值。所有功能的默认值为 MODE_COPY_FROM_METADATA 。鼓励使用子类中提供的非标准功能，但不要求使用类似方案。

trans-unit.source: Individual permissions always override permissions of the group(s) to which the individual belongs. That is, individual negative permissions (specific denial of permissions) override the groups' positive permissions. And individual positive permissions override the groups' negative permissions.
trans-unit.target: 个人的权限总是优先于个人所属的组的权限。也就是说,个人的消极权限(特定的拒绝权限)优先于组的积极权限。而个人的积极权限则优先于团体的消极权限。

trans-unit.source: Individual plug-ins may return an instance of ImageWriteParam with additional optional features enabled, or they may return an instance of a plug-in specific subclass of ImageWriteParam.
trans-unit.target: 各个插件可以返回启用了其他可选功能的 ImageWriteParam 的实例，或者它们可以返回 ImageWriteParam 的特定于插件的子类的实例。

trans-unit.source: Informs the caller whether this synthesizer is capable of loading instruments from the specified soundbank. If the soundbank is unsupported, any attempts to load instruments from it will result in an IllegalArgumentException.
trans-unit.target: 通知呼叫者此合成器是否能够从指定的音库加载乐器。如果不支持音库，则任何尝试从中加载乐器的操作都会导致 IllegalArgumentException 。

trans-unit.source: Informs the listener that a line's state has changed. The listener can then invoke LineEvent methods to obtain information about the event.
trans-unit.target: 通知侦听器线路状态已更改。然后，侦听器可以调用 LineEvent 方法以获得有关事件的信息。

trans-unit.source: Inheritable thread-local variables are used in preference to ordinary thread-local variables when the per-thread-attribute being maintained in the variable (e.g., User ID, Transaction ID) must be automatically transmitted to any child threads that are created.
trans-unit.target: 当变量中维护的每线程属性(如用户ID、事务ID)必须自动传输给任何创建的子线程时,可继承的线程局部变量优先于普通线程局部变量使用。

trans-unit.source: Initialize this object for signing. If this method is called again with a different argument, it negates the effect of this call.
trans-unit.target: 初始化这个对象进行签名。如果用不同的参数再次调用此方法,则否定此调用的效果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a ModelMBean object using ModelMBeanInfo passed in. This method makes it possible to set a customized ModelMBeanInfo on the ModelMBean as long as it is not registered with the MBeanServer.
trans-unit.target: 使用传入的ModelMBeanInfo初始化一个ModelMBean对象。这个方法可以在ModelMBean上设置一个自定义的ModelMBeanInfo,只要它没有在MBeanServer上注册。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new charset provider.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个新的字符集提供者。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new charset with the given canonical name and alias set.
trans-unit.target: 用给定的规范名和别名集初始化一个新的字符集。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new decoder. The new decoder will have the given chars-per-byte values and its replacement will be the string "\uFFFD".
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的解码器。新的解码器将具有给定的char-per-byte值，其替换为字符串 "\uFFFD" 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new encoder. The new encoder will have the given bytes-per-char and replacement values.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个新的编码器。新的编码器将具有给定的每字符字节数和替换值。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new encoder. The new encoder will have the given bytes-per-char values and its replacement will be the byte array {(byte)'?'}.
trans-unit.target: 初始化新的编码器。新的编码器将具有给定的每字符字节数值，其替换将是字节数组 { (byte)'?' } 。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化该类的一个新实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a newly created SequenceInputStream by remembering the argument, which must be an Enumeration that produces objects whose run-time type is InputStream. The input streams that are produced by the enumeration will be read, in order, to provide the bytes to be read from this SequenceInputStream. After each input stream from the enumeration is exhausted, it is closed by calling its close method.
trans-unit.target: 通过记住该参数来初始化新创建的 SequenceInputStream ，该参数必须是产生运行时类型为 InputStream 的对象的 Enumeration 。将读取由枚举产生的输入流，以便提供要从此 SequenceInputStream 读取的字节。枚举中的每个输入流用尽后，通过调用其 close 方法将其关闭。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a newly created SequenceInputStream by remembering the two arguments, which will be read in order, first s1 and then s2, to provide the bytes to be read from this SequenceInputStream.
trans-unit.target: 通过记住将依次读取的两个参数 s1 和 s2 来初始化新创建的 SequenceInputStream ，以提供要从此 SequenceInputStream 读取的字节。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a newly created String object so that it represents an empty character sequence. Note that use of this constructor is unnecessary since Strings are immutable.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个新创建的 String 对象，使其代表一个空字符序列。注意，由于字符串是不可变的，因此不需要使用此构造函数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a newly created String object so that it represents the same sequence of characters as the argument; in other words, the newly created string is a copy of the argument string. Unless an explicit copy of original is needed, use of this constructor is unnecessary since Strings are immutable.
trans-unit.target: 初始化一个新创建的 String 对象，使其表示与参数相同的字符序列；换句话说，新创建的字符串是参数字符串的副本。除非需要显式的 original 副本，否则不需要使用此构造函数，因为字符串是不可变的。

trans-unit.source: Initializes an instance of this class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化该类的一个实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes internal state after construction but before processing any tasks. If you override this method, you must invoke super.onStart() at the beginning of the method. Initialization requires care: Most fields must have legal default values, to ensure that attempted accesses from other threads work correctly even before this thread starts processing tasks.
trans-unit.target: 在构造之后但在处理任何任务之前初始化内部状态。如果重写此方法，则必须在该方法的开头调用 super.onStart() 。初始化需要小心：大多数字段必须具有合法的默认值，以确保即使在此线程开始处理任务之前，尝试从其他线程进行的访问也可以正常工作。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the
trans-unit.target: 初始化

trans-unit.source: Initializes the MAC with the given (secret) key and algorithm parameters.
trans-unit.target: 用给定的(秘密)密钥和算法参数初始化MAC。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the cause of this exception to the specified value. The cause is the throwable that caused this naming exception to be thrown.
trans-unit.target: 将这个异常的原因初始化为指定的值。异常原因是导致这个命名异常被抛出的可抛物。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the initial context using the supplied environment. Environment properties are discussed in the class description.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的环境来初始化初始上下文。环境属性在类描述中讨论。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the internal state of this CertPathChecker.
trans-unit.target: 初始化此 CertPathChecker 的内部状态。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the internal state of this PKIXCertPathChecker.
trans-unit.target: 初始化此 PKIXCertPathChecker 的内部状态。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the key generator with the specified parameter set and a user-provided source of randomness.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的参数集和用户提供的随机性源初始化密钥发生器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the key generator.
trans-unit.target: 初始化密钥生成器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the key pair generator for a certain keysize using a default parameter set and the SecureRandom implementation of the highest-priority installed provider as the source of randomness. (If none of the installed providers supply an implementation of SecureRandom, a system-provided source of randomness is used.)
trans-unit.target: 使用默认参数集和安装的最高优先级提供程序的 SecureRandom 实现作为随机性源，为特定密钥大小初始化密钥对生成器。（如果没有安装的提供程序提供 SecureRandom 的实现，则使用系统提供的随机性源。）

trans-unit.source: Initializes the key pair generator for a certain keysize with the given source of randomness (and a default parameter set).
trans-unit.target: 用给定的随机性源(和默认参数集)初始化一定大小的密钥对生成器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the key pair generator for a certain keysize, using the default parameter set.
trans-unit.target: 使用默认的参数集,初始化某个密钥大小的密钥对生成器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the key pair generator for a given modulus length (instead of parameters), and an optional SecureRandom bit source. If a SecureRandom bit source is needed but not supplied, i.e. null, a default SecureRandom instance will be used.
trans-unit.target: 初始化给定模数长度的密钥对生成器(而不是参数),以及一个可选的SecureRandom位源。如果需要SecureRandom位源但没有提供,即为空,则将使用一个默认的SecureRandom实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the key pair generator using the DSA family parameters (p,q and g) and an optional SecureRandom bit source. If a SecureRandom bit source is needed but not supplied, i.e. null, a default SecureRandom instance will be used.
trans-unit.target: 使用DSA系列参数(p,q和g)和可选的SecureRandom位源初始化密钥对生成器。如果需要SecureRandom位源但没有提供,即为空,则将使用一个默认的SecureRandom实例。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the key pair generator using the specified parameter set and the SecureRandom implementation of the highest-priority installed provider as the source of randomness. (If none of the installed providers supply an implementation of SecureRandom, a system-provided source of randomness is used.).
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的参数集和安装的最高优先级提供程序的 SecureRandom 实现作为随机源来初始化密钥对生成器。（如果没有安装的提供程序都提供 SecureRandom 的实现，则使用系统提供的随机性源。）

trans-unit.source: Initializes the key pair generator using the specified parameter set and user-provided source of randomness.
trans-unit.target: 使用指定的参数集和用户提供的随机性源初始化密钥对生成器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the key pair generator with the given parameter set and source of randomness.
trans-unit.target: 用给定的参数集和随机性源初始化密钥对生成器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the processor with the processing environment by setting the processingEnv field to the value of the processingEnv argument. An IllegalStateException will be thrown if this method is called more than once on the same object.
trans-unit.target: 通过将 processingEnv 字段设置为 processingEnv 参数的值来初始化具有处理环境的处理器。一个 IllegalStateException 异常，如果这种方法被称为不止一次对同一个对象将被抛出。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the processor with the processing environment.
trans-unit.target: 用处理环境初始化处理器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the reference to the MBean server.
trans-unit.target: 初始化对MBean服务器的引用。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this Mac object with the given key and algorithm parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的键和算法参数初始化此 Mac 对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this Mac object with the given key.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的密​​钥初始化此 Mac 对象。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this cipher with a key and a set of algorithm parameters.
trans-unit.target: 用一个密钥和一组算法参数来初始化这个密码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this cipher with a key and a source of randomness.
trans-unit.target: 用一个密钥和一个随机性源来初始化这个密码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this cipher with a key, a set of algorithm parameters, and a source of randomness.
trans-unit.target: 用一个密钥、一组算法参数和一个随机性源来初始化这个密码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this cipher with a key.
trans-unit.target: 用一个密钥来初始化这个密码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this cipher with the public key from the given certificate and a source of randomness.
trans-unit.target: 用给定证书中的公钥和随机性源初始化这个密码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this cipher with the public key from the given certificate.
trans-unit.target: 用给定证书中的公钥初始化这个密码。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this context.
trans-unit.target: 初始化这个上下文。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this context. Either of the first two parameters may be null in which case the installed security providers will be searched for the highest priority implementation of the appropriate factory. Likewise, the secure random parameter may be null in which case the default implementation will be used.
trans-unit.target: 初始化此上下文。前两个参数中的任何一个都可以为空,在这种情况下,将搜索已安装的安全提供者,以寻找相应工厂的最高优先级实现。同样,安全随机参数也可以为空,在这种情况下,将使用默认的实现。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this exemption mechanism with a key and a set of algorithm parameters.
trans-unit.target: 用一个密钥和一组算法参数来初始化这个豁免机制。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this exemption mechanism with a key.
trans-unit.target: 用密钥初始化这个豁免机制。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this factory with a source of certificate authorities and related trust material.
trans-unit.target: 初始化这个工厂的证书机构和相关信任材料的来源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this factory with a source of key material.
trans-unit.target: 用一个关键材料的来源来初始化这个工厂。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this factory with a source of provider-specific key material.
trans-unit.target: 用提供者特定的钥匙材料的来源初始化这个工厂。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this factory with a source of provider-specific trust material.
trans-unit.target: 用特定于提供者的信任材料的来源初始化这个工厂。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this key agreement with the given key and set of algorithm parameters.
trans-unit.target: 用给定的密钥和一组算法参数初始化这个密钥协议。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this key agreement with the given key and source of randomness. The given key is required to contain all the algorithm parameters required for this key agreement.
trans-unit.target: 用给定的密钥和随机性源初始化这个密钥协议。给定的密钥必须包含该密钥协议所需的所有算法参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this key agreement with the given key, set of algorithm parameters, and source of randomness.
trans-unit.target: 用给定的密钥、算法参数集和随机性来源初始化这个密钥协议。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this key agreement with the given key, which is required to contain all the algorithm parameters required for this key agreement.
trans-unit.target: 用给定的密钥初始化该密钥协议,该密钥协议需要包含该密钥协议所需的所有算法参数。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this key generator for a certain keysize, using a user-provided source of randomness.
trans-unit.target: 使用用户提供的随机性源,初始化特定密钥大小的密钥生成器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this key generator for a certain keysize, using the given source of randomness.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定的随机性源,初始化一定密钥大小的密钥生成器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this key generator for a certain keysize.
trans-unit.target: 初始化该密钥生成器的某个密钥大小。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this key generator with the specified parameter set and a user-provided source of randomness.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的参数集和用户提供的随机性源初始化这个密钥发生器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this key generator with the specified parameter set.
trans-unit.target: 用指定的参数集初始化这个密钥生成器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this key generator.
trans-unit.target: 初始化这个密钥生成器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this object for verification, using the public key from the given certificate.
trans-unit.target: 使用给定证书中的公钥初始化这个对象进行验证。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this object for verification. If this method is called again with a different argument, it negates the effect of this call.
trans-unit.target: 初始化这个对象,以便进行验证。如果用不同的参数再次调用此方法,则否定此调用的效果。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this parameter generator for a certain size and source of randomness.
trans-unit.target: 初始化该参数发生器的一定大小和随机性来源。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this parameter generator for a certain size. To create the parameters, the SecureRandom implementation of the highest-priority installed provider is used as the source of randomness. (If none of the installed providers supply an implementation of SecureRandom, a system-provided source of randomness is used.)
trans-unit.target: 将此参数生成器初始化为特定大小。为了创建参数，已安装的优先级最高的提供程序的 SecureRandom 实现用作随机性的来源。（如果没有安装的提供程序提供 SecureRandom 的实现，则使用系统提供的随机性源。）

trans-unit.source: Initializes this parameter generator with a set of algorithm-specific parameter generation values.
trans-unit.target: 用一组特定算法的参数生成值来初始化这个参数生成器。

trans-unit.source: Initializes this parameter generator with a set of algorithm-specific parameter generation values. To generate the parameters, the SecureRandom implementation of the highest-priority installed provider is used as the source of randomness. (If none of the installed providers supply an implementation of SecureRandom, a system-provided source of randomness is used.)
trans-unit.target: 使用一组特定于算法的参数生成值初始化此参数生成器。为了生成参数，已安装优先级最高的提供程序的 SecureRandom 实现用作随机性的来源。（如果没有安装的提供程序提供 SecureRandom 的实现，则使用系统提供的随机性源。）
